title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 855.3 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 855.3 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity

State Regulations

The classifications and standards of quality and purity
which are hereby assigned to all fresh surface waters within the Rondout

River-Rondout Creek-Wallkill River drainage basin are as set forth in tables I
and II of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
855.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
